meanings.definition: In a drunken or intoxicated manner.
meanings.sent1: He stumbled unsoberly out of the bar.
meanings.sent2: She laughed unsoberly at the comedian's jokes.
meanings.sent3: The cat wobbled unsoberly after eating the catnip.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled unsoberly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The toddler danced unsoberly around the living room.
